entry.title: WIND WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:03 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 12:21 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: SSE 67 km/h gust 87 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
